questions: Can you concentrate easily on tasks, even if they are boring or repetitive?
Do you find it difficult to focus on one thing for an extended period of time?
How often do you find yourself getting distracted during conversations or while reading?
Can you easily switch between different tasks without losing focus?
Do you tend to forget instructions or details shortly after receiving them?
How frequently do you misplace or lose items like keys, wallet, or phone?
Are you often forgetful in daily activities, like running errands or returning calls?
Do you have trouble organizing tasks and activities?
How frequently do you find it hard to sustain attention during activities like reading or watching movies?
Can you maintain focus on tasks even in noisy or distracting environments?
